sources.title: Honor of the Press (1932) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
Stars: Edward J. Nugent, Rita La Roy, Dorothy Gulliver
Director: B. Reeves Eason

After string of robberies remain unsolved, the owner of the city newspaper blames the police for not rounding up the crooks. But a young reporter discovers that a coded message in the newspaper's editor's box tips the crooks about each robbery!

metadata.Plot: Cub reporter Daniel Greely gets a job on a big city newspaper. A string of robberies occur and the owner of the paper blames the police for not rounding up the crooks. Daniel discovers that a coded message in the newspaper's editor's box tips the crooks about each robbery.
metadata.Writer: John T. Neville, Michael L. Simmons, J.K. Foster
metadata.Actors: Edward J. Nugent, Rita La Roy, Dorothy Gulliver
